title: Example: Value Iteration

definitions.Vk+1(s): max [Σ T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γVk(s')] ]

formulas: Vk+1(s) < max [Σ T(s, a, s') [R(s, a, s') + γVk(s')] ]
summary: The slide provides an example of Value Iteration in AI, showing the calculation of value functions at different states and the decision-making process based on speed (slow or fast). It includes a diagram illustrating the transition of states with rewards and a formula for calculating the value function.
